snippet: Murray Moss, the man behind the now-shuttered Manhattan design boutique Moss, has embarked on an unexpected side project in which he pairs vintage press photos that suggest bizarre new narratives.
abstract: Murray Moss, the man behind the now-shuttered Manhattan design boutique Moss, has embarked on an unexpected side project in which he pairs vintage press photos that suggest bizarre new narratives.

headline.main: From the Design Curator Murray Moss, a Book of Unexpected Juxtapositions
